product_name: Pedro's Syn Lube Chain Lubricant - 4 oz.
long_description: Syn Lube's improved formula provides long- lasting performance and decreased chain wear--this mid-weight lubricant electrostatically bonds with chain. Formulated with a special detergent blend that breaks down trail grime and debris. A clear favorite among cyclocross racers.
short_description: Syn Lube's improved formula provides long- lasting performance and decreased chain wear--this mid-weight lubricant electrostatically bonds with chain.
